name: Glorbo's Kingdom
description:
Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45!

Feed the royal life-giver, King Glorbo, by shooting pearbles into his mouth and create beeple, Glorbo's waddling citizens! Push away bombs and protect the beeple to win and get a high-score!

Note: We recommend players use a mouse to play Glorbo's Kingdom.

Creators

Rowan Allcorn - Art, Design (@cicaadaa)

Drew Godden - Programming, Design (@drewgodden)
